title: pAril nalvazhi
sahitya:
paAril nalvazhi kATTi anbODennai ippADi kAppadun bhAram dIpAmbikE


anupallavi

  kAriruL shUzh bhuvi vAzhvinilE iru kaNNirundenna payan nIyillAmal


caraNam    un pOla nAnoru peN pEdaiyE enakkini unaiyanRi gatiyillai vErE
tunbak-kATrinilE nAn alaiyAmal neri tavari taDumAri vizhAmal
